flagDescription: A skull with fox-like features and a split jaw design

keyMoments.title: Foxy Pirates Compete in Donut Race
keyMoments.description: The Foxy Pirates field their team of Porche, Capote, and Monda in the Cutie Wagon to compete against the Straw Hats in the first round of the Davy Back Fight.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the Foxy Pirates' experience and skill in the Davy Back Fight, using their best aquatic fighters.

formation.formationStory: Formed by Foxy to participate in Davy Back Fights and grow their crew by winning members from other pirate crews.

crewGoals: Win Davy Back Fights to increase crew size and strength
Defeat the Straw Hat Pirates and take their crew members
notableAchievements: Participated in 920 Davy Back Fight victories before facing the Straw Hats
philosophies: Victory through any means including cheating and deception
Crew expansion through Davy Back Fights

flagDescription: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it

keyMoments.title: Straw Hats Compete in Donut Race
keyMoments.description: Nami, Usopp, and Robin (in manga; more members in anime) represent the Straw Hats in the Barrel Tiger, racing against the Foxy Pirates in the Davy Back Fight.
keyMoments.significance: First time the Straw Hats participate in a Davy Back Fight, with crew members at stake.

keyMoments.title: Strategic Use of Skypiea Technology
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hats employ the Impact Dial obtained from Skypiea to compete against the Foxy Pirates' aquatic advantages.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates how the crew utilizes tools and knowledge from previous adventures in new situations.
